sentences.sContent: The disciple was a Jew . "What good work shall I do to be acceptable to God "?
sentences.sContent_eng: The disciple was a Jew . "What good work shall I do to be acceptable to God "?
sentences.sCn: 一个犹太人门徒问：“我应该做什么样工作才能让上帝接受?”（合上帝之意?。

sentences.sContent: If a Christian wrong a Jew, what should his sufferance be by Christian example? Why, revenge.
sentences.sContent_eng: If a Christian wrong a Jew, what should his sufferance be by Christian example? Why, revenge.
sentences.sCn: 要是一个犹太人欺侮了一个基督徒，那基督徒怎样表现他的谦逊？报仇。 妹。

synos.tran: 犹太人；犹太教徒；守财奴

trans.tranOther: someone whose religion is Judaism, or who is a member of a group whose traditional religion is Judaism
